code: public void testModulesWithClientSettings() throws Exception {     Settings settings = Settings.builder().put("path.home", createTempDir()).put(Client.CLIENT_TYPE_SETTING_S.getKey(), TransportClient.CLIENT_TYPE).build().     Monitoring plugin = new Monitoring(settings).     assertThat(plugin.isEnabled(), is(true)).     assertThat(plugin.isTransportClient(), is(true)). }

public void testModulesWithNodeSettings() throws Exception {     // these settings mimic what ES does when running as a node...     Settings settings = Settings.builder().put("path.home", createTempDir()).put(Client.CLIENT_TYPE_SETTING_S.getKey(), "node").build().     Monitoring plugin = new Monitoring(settings).     assertThat(plugin.isEnabled(), is(true)).     assertThat(plugin.isTransportClient(), is(false)). }
